name: playwright-typescript-cucumber-allure-demo
description: Playwright + TypeScript + Cucumber BDD framework with Allure reporting

scripts.test: npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js --config framework/cucumber.js
scripts.test:ui: npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js --config framework/cucumber.js -p ui
scripts.test:api: npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js --config framework/cucumber.js -p api
scripts.allure:generate: npm run clean-env && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:report: npm test && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
